Package org.sd.bdb

Interface Summary
DbIterator<T> A database iterator differs from a normal iterator in that it must be closed when its use is finished.
DbMap.Loader  
DbMap.ResumableLoader  
TransactionFunction Strategy pattern interface for performing a function under a transaction.
 

Class Summary
BaseDbIterator<T> Base implementation of a db iterator.
BaseFileLoader A base loader for loading a file line-by-line.
BerkeleyDb Wrapper around a BerkeleyDB.
CursorDeleteFunction A transaction function for deleting the item 'before' the cursor.
DbDump Utility to dump a berkeley database.
DbDump.QueryResult Container class for a query result.
DbHandle Handle on a berkeley database with transactional db read/write methods.
DbInfo Container for database info.
DbMap Map class backed by a Berkeley DB.
DbUtil Utility methods.
DbValue Base container class for a db value.
KeyOrderIterator Key order iterator over the database.
LongKeyOrderIterator Key order iterator over the database.
LongKeyValuePair Container class for a key/value pair.
LongTimeOrderIterator Key order iterator over the database.
PopFunction A transaction function for popping timestamped data from the database.
PushFunction A transaction function for inserting a value to the 'front' of the timestamped index.
PutFunction A transaction function for putting data into the database.
RawDbIterator Iterator over raw (DatabaseEntry) database content.
RawKeyValuePair Container for a raw (bdb DatabaseEntry) key and value.
StringKeyValuePair Container class for a key/value pair.
TimeOrderIterator Key order iterator over the database.
TimestampedValue Wrapper for a timestamped value.
TimestampedValue.TsKeyCreator  
UpdateFunction A transaction function for updating data in the database.
 

Enum Summary
DbTraversal Enumeration of database traversal types.
